## resize package

svelte action - `use:resize` svelte action that wraps [ResizeObserver](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ResizeObserver)

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ResizeAttributes](./resize.resizeattributes.md) | Additional attributes extended from <code>svelte-put/resize</code> |
|  [ResizeDetail](./resize.resizedetail.md) | <code>detail</code> payload for <code>resize</code> [CustomEvent](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CustomEvent) |
|  [ResizeParameters](./resize.resizeparameters.md) | svelte action parameters to config behavior of <code>resize</code> |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [resize](./resize.resize.md) | Create an [ResizeObserver](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ResizeObserver) that observers this node |
